articles.title: Second NZ Test shifted to Karachi - Sport - DAWN.COM - DAWN.com
articles.description: The Test is shifted due to 'deteriorating' weather conditions in Multan, the previously-announced venue.
articles.content:
LAHORE: The second Test between Pakistan and New Zealand next month has been moved from Multan to Karachi due to deteriorating weather conditions, the Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) said on Saturday.

articles.title: How 'Impact Player Rule' will help senior players - Rediff.com
articles.description: The 'Impact Player Rule' allows a team to have four such players named in a squad of 15 before the match and they can be substitute any time during a team's innings by the 14th over.
